org.tiledreader

Interface TiledCustomizable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayTileLayer, HashTileLayer, TiledGroupLayer, TiledImageLayer, TiledLayer, TiledMap, TiledObject, TiledObjectLayer, TiledObjectTemplate, TiledObjectType, TiledTile, TiledTileLayer, TiledTileset

    public interface TiledCustomizable

    A TiledCustomizable object represents an entity (such as a map, map layer, or tileset) that can be given custom properties, defined by a <properties> tag inside the entity's tag in a Tiled XML file.

    Author:
    Alex Heyman

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Object> getProperties()
      Returns an unmodifiable Map view of this entity's custom properties.
      Object getProperty(String name)
      Returns the value of this entity's custom property with the specified name, or null if no such property was specified.

    • Method Detail

      • getProperties

        Map<String,Object> getProperties()
        Returns an unmodifiable Map view of this entity's custom properties. Each key in the Map is the name of a property, and its corresponding value is the value of that property. The type of the value object corresponds to the type of the property: String for a string property, Integer for an int, Float for a float, Boolean for a bool, java.awt.Color for a color, TiledFile for a file, and TiledObject for an object (unless the object property is unset, in which case the value is null).
        Returns:
        This entity's custom properties

      • getProperty

        Object getProperty(String name)
        Returns the value of this entity's custom property with the specified name, or null if no such property was specified. The type of the returned value object corresponds to the type of the property: String for a string property, Integer for an int, Float for a float, Boolean for a bool, java.awt.Color for a color, TiledFile for a file, and TiledObject for an object (unless the object property is unset, in which case the value is null).
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property whose value is to be returned
        Returns:
        The value of this entity's custom property with the specified name
